dct_description_sm: Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. G.S.G.S. no. 4480. United States. Army. Co. "C" 660th Engineers. Map is in four sheet. In upper left margin: "Berlin 1:25,000". In upper right margin: "Sheet 2". "Inset: "Town center scale 1:12,500". Map B: Annex to Protocol on zones of occupation of German and the administration of "Greater Berlin". In lower right margin: "Copied from a German map dated 1937. Reproduced by Co. "C" 660th Engineers, U.S. Army ". GPO-DSSO-3949. Map shows boundaries of the parts of Berlin allotted to the U.K., U.S.A., and U.S.S.R.
